text: Cui Ren (; ; born 19 January 1989 in Yanji) is a Chinese footballer of Korean descent who currently plays for Zhejiang Greentown in the China League One. ==Club career== Cui Ren was promoted to China League One side Yanbian FC in 2007.2007中国足球甲级联赛球员延边队大名单 at sohu 2007-03-30 Retrieved 2015-03-25 On 29 March 2009, he made his senior debut in a 2–1 away defeat against Shanghai East Asia.王佳玉点球敖飞帆替补绝杀 东亚2-1逆转延边开门红 at sina 2009-03-29 Retrieved 2015-03-25 On 26 September 2009, he scored his first senior goal in a 3–1 away defeat against Sichuan FC.副班长绝地反击 四川主场3-2延边留保级一线生机 at sina 2009-09-26 Retrieved 2015-03-25 Cui was linked with another League One club Qingdao Hainiu by the end of 2013 season; however, Yanbian refused his transfer request.延边、亚泰同将失去当家球星？ at Netease 2014-01-05 Retrieved 2015-03-26 On 9 February 2015, Cui moved to Chinese Super League side Shanghai Shenxin on a free transfer.申鑫官方宣布签三将:鲁能射手+延边中场+成都门将 at Shanghai Online 2015-02-10 Retrieved 2015-03-26 He made his Super League debut on 15 March 2015, in the second match of the season against Shanghai SIPG, coming on as a substitute for Everton.中超-海森传射孔卡角球中横梁 申鑫0-2上港 at sina 2015-03-15 Retrieved 2015-03-26 On 1 January 2016, Cui returned to Yanbian after Shanghai Shenxin's relegation.申鑫官方宣布崔仁正式转会 昔日悍将重归延边 at sina 2016-01-01 Retrieved 2016-01-01 He transferred to China League One side Zhejiang Greentown on 1 March 2019 after Yanbian Funde was disqualified for the 2019 season due to owing taxes.绿城官方宣布与延边中场签约 将为攻击线增加助力 at sina 2019-03-01 Retrieved 2019-03-01 == Career statistics == Statistics accurate
